item.title: Occam's Razor
item.author: Author
item.description: Occam’s razor (or Ockham’s razor) is a principle from philosophy. Suppose there exist two explanations for an occurrence. In this case the one that requires the smallest number of assumptions is usually correct. No backlinks!
